englishTranslation: The report is not like witnessing.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: War is deception.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: A Muslim is a mirror of the Muslim.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Someone whose advice is sought is in a position of trust.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The person guiding (someone) to do a good deed, is like the one performing the good deed.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Seek help for any needs discreetly.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Protect yourself from the fire even with a part of a date.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: الدُّنْیَا سِجْنُ الْمُؤمِنِ وَ جَنَّةُ الْکَافِرِ
englishTranslation: The world is the believer’s prison and the disbeliever’s paradise.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Modesty is entirely good.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The word of the believer is like seizing of the hand.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: لَا یَحِلُّ لِمُؤمِنٍ اَنْ یَّجُهْرَ أخَاهُ فَوقَ ثَلَاثَةِ أیَّامٍ
englishTranslation: It is unlawful for a believer to sever relations with his brother for more than three days.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: He is not one of us who cheats us.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: مَا قَلَّ وَكَفَى خَيْرٌ مِمَّا كَثُرَ وَأَلْهَى
englishTranslation: A little that suffices is better than an abundance that distracts.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: الرَّاجِعُ فِيْ هِبَتِهِ کَالرَّاجِعِ فِيْ قَیْئِهِ
englishTranslation: Someone who takes back his gift is like someone who eats his vomit.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Affliction comes from (loose) talk.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: People are like the teeth of a comb.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Richness lies in the richness of the soul.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The felicitous person takes lessons from (the actions of) others.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: وَ إِنَّ مِنَ الشِّعْرِ لَحِکْمَةً وَاِنَّ مِنَ الْبَیَانِ لَسِحْرًا
englishTranslation: Indeed, in poetry there is wisdom and in eloquence there is magic.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The king’s pardon preserves the kingdom.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: A man will be with whom he loves.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: A man who knows his worth will not be ruined.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The child belongs to the bed and stoning is for the adulterer.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: الْیَدُ الْعُلْیَا خَیْرٌ مِّنَ الْیَدِ السُّفْلَی
englishTranslation: The upper hand is superior to the lower hand.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: لَا شَکَرَ اللهَ مَنْ لَّا یَشْکُرُ النَّاسَ
englishTranslation: He does not thank Allah who does not thank people.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Your love of something can blind and deafen (you).

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: جُبِلَتِ الْقُلُوبُ عَلی حُبَّ مَنْ اَحْسَنَ اِلَیْهَا وَ بُغْضِ مَنْ اَسَاءَ اِلَیْهَا
englishTranslation: Hearts are predisposed to love someone who does them good and detest someone who does them harm.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: الْتَّائِبُ مِنَ الذَّنْبِ کَمَنْ لَا ذَنْبَ لَهُ
englishTranslation: One who repents from sin is like someone without sin.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: الشَّاهِدُ یَرَی مَا لَا یَرَاهُ الْغَائِبُ
englishTranslation: The person who actually witnesses an (event) sees that which one who is absent does not.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: If the nobleman of a people comes to you, honour him.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: False oaths lay waste to home (lands).

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: مَنْ قُتِلَ دُونَ مَالِهِ فَهُوَ شَهِیْدٌ
englishTranslation: Whoever is killed attempting to save his property is a martyr.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Actions are through intentions.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The leader of a people is their servant.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The best of affairs is that which is balanced.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

arabicText: اَللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ فِیْ أُمَّتِیْ فِی بُکُوْرِهَا یَوْمَ الْخَمِیْسِ
englishTranslation: O Allah, bless my nation in its early rising on Thursdays!

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Poverty can almost turn into disbelief.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Travelling is a portion of punishment.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: The best of provision is God-Consciousness (taqwa).

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi

englishTranslation: Meetings are under trust.

book.title: The Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah
book.author: Shah Waliullah Dahlawi

chapter.title: Forty Hadith of Shah Waliullah Dehlawi
